text:
A case has been registered against Rajavel, a former town secretary of PMK of Palacodde for assaulting a reporter of Dina Thandhi , a Tamil daily, on Wednesday.

The case is that Rajavel slapped the reporter when he met him to claim Rs. 11,000 outstanding for placing an advertisement in the paper some months ago.

Sections 294 b, and 323 of IPC has been invoked against Rajavel.
title: Case against PMK functionary
